Server configurationÂ¶

The eOn server uses a single configuration file, config.ini. The format of the file is the .ini format. The .ini format consists of sections, keys, and values. Each section header is surrounded by square brackets, and is followed by the key/value pairs. For example, to set the temperature key of the [akmc] section to the value 450, your config.ini file would include the lines:

[akmc]
temperature = 450
